text: Ezɨ akam inigha izir gumazir kam ghua kamaghɨn Atrivim Ahap mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, ‘Sirian gumazamiziba ghaze kɨ mɨghsɨabar asem, egha danganir zaribar itir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ ian amamangatɨghtɨ, ia men mɨdorozir gumazir avɨrir kam abɨragham. Eghtɨ ia Israelia kamaghɨn fogh suam, kɨ uabɨ kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God.’ ”
